# ABC DAO

> Green Hat Free Open Source Software Collective on Farcaster and Base. Founded October 2025 by T. Dylan Daniel.

## About

ABC DAO is a community-run collective that builds open source software for Farcaster and Base. The $ABC token represents ABCDAO onchain in the Base ecosystem. The DAO operates transparently with a multisig treasury and focuses on cooperation primitives — shared liquidity pools, routing infrastructure, and community tooling.

Founded: October 2025 by T. Dylan Daniel
Structure: Multisig (founder-controlled, decentralization planned)

## Ownership

ABC DAO owns:
- ArbMe (open source DeFi protocol, January 2026)
- Alpha (AI agent, February 2026)
- Ecosystem tokens: $EPICDYLAN.COM, $ABC, $ARBME, $RATCHET, $ALPHACLAW, $CHAOS, $PAGE

## Roadmap

Current: Founder-led with community participation (~10 active contributors)
Future: Progressive decentralization via LitPKP, governed by $ABC token voting

## Authorship

- **Dylan Daniel** (Founder) — DAO design, economic model, all product decisions
- **Claude (claude.ai Opus + Claude Code with OpenClaw)** — frontend, design system, deployment infrastructure
- **Alpha** — onchain AI agent product; handles market analysis, position maintenance, and market monitoring (Alpha is a tool in the ecosystem, not the builder)
